long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flatlay is the social marketplace and publishing platform helping people build, share and monetize product related content. The platform allows brands, retailers and advertisers to find suitable influencers for their marketing campaigns.

This extension helps you easily view the analytics and engagement of content for any Instagram profile to add them to lists and invite them to work with your company on a campaign. To use the extension, you need to have a business account on Flatlay. 

Get started for free at:
https://flatlay.io
